com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheap
Interface OffHeapPayloadAddressable

All Superinterfaces:
OffHeapAddressable
All Known Implementing Classes:
OffHeapPayloadArray, OffHeapPayloadArrayList
public interface OffHeapPayloadAddressable
extends OffHeapAddressable

Interface for off-heap header-payload collection.

Author:
alexkasko Date: 3/4/13
